name: SIXGUN
description:
SIXGUN is a one button local multiplayer experience for up to 8 players.

Hold your button to aim your character. Release it to move.

While moving, press your button again to shoot. Aiming is calculated automatically.

If you locate any bugs or glitches, email me at noahvan35@gmail.com and i'll look into it.

Game works with keyboard, mouse and supports up to 1 game-pad.
